sections.heading: Board of Education; rules and regulations
sections.text: The State Board of Education may adopt, promulgate, and publish rules and regulations necessary to carry out the Special Education Act.SourceLaws 1973, LB 403, ยง 29;R.S.1943, (1984), ยง 43-660;Laws 1987, LB 367, ยง 48;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-3348;Laws 1996, LB
